divs: sighting detailsresponse to filed report - box like ufo in illinois - submitted 12\21\09 - event date - 6\11\03. on jan.5,2000 a man named melvin knoll saw a very similar shaped craft and reported it to the highland police department in illinois. that night the craft was observed by several officers from lebanon, millstadt and shiloh police departments. melvin stated that it looked box like from his viewpoint. the officers described a triangular or arrowhead shape as it hovered, appearing to "jump" from one point to another. the event was well documented and the encounter was detailed on a television special.
Summary: Response to "box like ufo in Illinois" - submitted 2009-12-21 Event - 6/11/03
